mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectTestAdmin Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ADMIN_ID , PW , ADMIN_TP_CD , ADMIN_STAT_CD , APRV_DT , SECSN_DT , ADMIN_NM , ADMIN_EMP_NO , DEPT_NM , COM_ID , SHOP_ID , EMAIL , MOBIL_NATION_NO , MOBIL_AREA_NO , MOBIL_TLOF_NO , MOBIL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM TEST_ADMIN WHERE 1 = 1 AND ADMIN_ID = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteTestAdmin Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM TEST_ADMIN WHERE 1 = 1 AND ADMIN_ID = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
